page.title: 03WOODLAND IN WITHYHAM/ST.JN
page.content: I live on the Ashdown{Forest}in the Mardens Hill area of Crowborough and the following{trees}grow in this area. Oak, Sycamore, Willow, Hawthorn, Ash, Holly, Pine, Horse Chestnut, Beech, Hazel, Sweet Chestnut, Crab Apple, Silver Birch. We also have a lovely range of wild {flowers}which bloom through different seasons of the year. These include violet Ragged Robin, Primrose, Cow Parsley, Bluebell, Clover, Buttercup, Dandelion, wild Daffodil, Honeysuckle, Roseboy, willowherb woon, anemone, common orchid, vetch, Speedwell, Dog rose, Thistle, Forget-me-not, Birdweed, Foxglove, Gorse, Greater Stitenwork, Birsfoot, Trefoil, Rhodedendron. The woodland supports a lot of{wildlife including weasels, Squirrels, Badgers,Shrews, foxes, field mice.
